TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SerialPinChange extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the type of change that occurred on the object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This enumeration is used with the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.PinChanged> event.
A serial port pin changes state when it is asserted or unasserted.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IO.Ports.SerialPinChange Break = int32(64)

Docs.summary: A break was detected on input.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IO.Ports.SerialPinChange CDChanged = int32(32)

Docs.summary: The Carrier Detect (CD) signal changed state. This signal is used to indicate whether a modem is connected to a working phone line and a data carrier signal is detected.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IO.Ports.SerialPinChange CtsChanged = int32(8)

Docs.summary: The Clear to Send (CTS) signal changed state. This signal is used to indicate whether data can be sent over the serial port.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IO.Ports.SerialPinChange DsrChanged = int32(16)

Docs.summary: The Data Set Ready (DSR) signal changed state. This signal is used to indicate whether the device on the serial port is ready to operate.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IO.Ports.SerialPinChange Ring = int32(256)
